features: 【400 Classic Games】This mini retro handheld game console has 400 built-in classic games. The classic game allows you to play 400 games without any advertising or additional costs, including Arcade retro games, puzzles, arcades, shooting, racing, fighting, adventure etc. Each game is classical in your childhood. More choice for playing, recall the wonderful childhood memories and have funny game time with kids or friends, You can have a break in the spare time.

【Support for 2 Players &Supports TV connection】You can play with your partner by connecting the game controller. One can play with the handheld console, the other can play with the gamepad. The retro game console comes with an AV cable, so you can connect the console to your TV and enjoy vivid and exciting video games!

【Rechargeable Battery】 Built-in 1020mAh high capacity lithium battery, the mini game console comes with USB cable, charging time is about 1~3 hours, 6~9 hours of continuous game play. When you are on a business trip, traveling,camping, you don't have to worry about running out of power. (Note: Please Tear Off The Insulation Film On The Battery Interface Before Putting The Battery into The Device, and Fully Charge The Battery Before First Use.)
【HD 3'Full Color Screen】Full color screen of the retro handheld game console bring you vivid picture and better display, no lag and clearer. All is for your great gaming time.

【Perfect Gift for Kids & Adult】Our handheld game console is ideal for Birthday, Christmas, Wedding Anniversary, Thanksgiving, New Year and Holidays gifts for kids, boys, girls, family and friends. The interactive entertainment of game competition enhances interaction, bringing more happiness to the whole family.
body.description: ZeroStory Retro Handheld Game Console Built-in 400 classic games: Arcade retro games, Logic & math, Sports, Puzzle, Arcade, Shooting, Action, Racing, Fighting games, Strategy, Adventure, Card games and more to meet your demand to play varieties of games what you like. High-resolution screen： It features a colorful LCD screen and supports AV output, not only giving you a high-quality picture and gaming experience, but also making you more stress-free and make you feel better. Meanwhile, you could bring it everywhere with slim design. NOTE: 12-month commitment, If there is any quality problem with the product,we will send a replacements. PACKAGE INCLUDES: Handheld Game Console x 1Controller x 1USB Charging Cable x 1AV Cable x 11020mAh Battery x 1User Manual x 1

Meanwhile, you could bring it everywhere with slim design. NOTE: 12-month commitment, If there is any quality problem with the product,we will send a replacements. PACKAGE INCLUDES: Handheld Game Console x 1Controller x 1USB Charging Cable x 1AV Cable x 11020mAh Battery x 1User Manual x 1 Product Type: Handheld Game Console Screen size: 3 inch screen Game digit: 8-digit Build-in: 400 games Battery capacity: 1020mAh rechargeable battery TV connection: Support Languages: English Endurance: 6-9 hours Supports 2-player online

As a gaming fan, handheld games must be an indispensable device. It can make you reflect on the fun of playing games when you were a kid, and enhance your relationship with your family, let you enjoy parent-child time. Whether it's a party or a journey, it's also a form of entertainment.
